1370: Poppo was born in Breestraat in 1370.
Got married to Sara at age 23 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Sara, Poppo, at age 24.
1375: Had a daughter with Sara, Saxiardis, at age 28.
1376: Had a son with Sara, Tielen, at age 29.
1377: Had a daughter with Sara, Marisseis, at age 30.
1378: Had a daughter with Sara, Siwa, at age 31.
1381: Had a daughter with Sara, Sybillia, at age 34.
1382: Lost son Tielen when Tielen was 7 years old.
1384: Had a son with Sara, Lambrecht, at age 37.
1389: Lost his wife Sara while she was giving birth to Aleberna in 1389.
Lost daughter Aleberna when Aleberna was 1 years old.
